headline: Mastercard Incorporated (MA): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) on Rijnberk InvestInsights’ Substack by Daan Rijnberk. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MA. Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA)’s share was trading at $521.36 as of Jan 3rd. MA’s trailing and forward P/E were 39.41 and 32.15 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: US retail sales rose 3.8% this holiday season
summary: Consumers were motivated by deals with last-minute purchases accounting for 10% of all holiday spending, per Mastercard.
